results.title: Metformin reverses oxidative stress-induced mitochondrial dysfunction in pre-osteoblasts via the EGFR/GSK-3beta/calcium pathway
results.text_hl: The authors previously found that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can reverse the @DISEASE_Bone_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D001847 @@@loss of bone mass@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Osteoporosis_Postmenopausal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015663 @@@post-menopausal osteoporosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Cao F, Yang K, Qiu S, Li J, Jiang W, Tao L, Zhu Y. Metformin reverses oxidative stress-induced mitochondrial dysfunction in pre-osteoblasts via the EGFR/GSK-3beta/calcium pathway Int J Mol Med. 2023 Apr;51(4):. PMID: 36999607

results.title: Linagliptin-metformin combination: A novel approach to mitigate 4-vinyl cyclohexene di epoxide and dexamethasone-induced osteoporosis in mice.
results.text_hl: In this study, we explored the effect of 4-week treatment with @CHEMICAL_Linagliptin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069476 @@@linagliptin@@@ (a @GENE_DPP4 @GENE_13482 @@@DPP-4@@@ inhibitor) and its combination with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Osteoporosis_Postmenopausal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015663 @@@PMO@@@ and @DISEASE_Osteoporosis @DISEASE_MESH:D010024 @@@GIO@@@ in @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

citations.NLM: Nirwan N, Jain S, Vohora D. Linagliptin-metformin combination: A novel approach to mitigate 4-vinyl cyclohexene di epoxide and dexamethasone-induced osteoporosis in mice. Bone. 2025 Sep;198():117526. PMID: 40398630
citations.BibTeX: @article{40398630, title={Linagliptin-metformin combination: A novel approach to mitigate 4-vinyl cyclohexene di epoxide and dexamethasone-induced osteoporosis in mice.}, author={Nirwan N and Jain S and Vohora D}, journal={Bone}, volume={198}, pages={117526}}

results.title: Hair loss in women.
results.text_hl: When @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@polycystic ovary syndrome@@@ is associated with @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@insulin resistance@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ must be considered as treatment.

citations.NLM: Camacho-Martínez FM. Hair loss in women. Semin Cutan Med Surg. 2009 Mar;28(1):19-32. PMID: 19341939
citations.BibTeX: @article{19341939, title={Hair loss in women.}, author={Camacho-Martínez FM}, journal={Semin Cutan Med Surg}, volume={28}, number={1}, pages={19-32}}
